resources.string: NaviBlind Five

Please wait...service not ready.
Please try again...

NOT USED: Welcome to the Department of Computer Science. You are now on the second floor of the extension building.For room number two six seven, walk to your right towards the main door, this is normally open but please exercise caution.

Welcome to the Department of Computer Science. You are now on the second floor of the extension building. This application will guide you to room number two six seven. When ready to start, wait for the notification alert and say "I am ready to start".

This waypoint is NEAR LIFTS: Please turn backwards and start walking forward for about fifteen (15) steps. Then turn cautiously to the right and take the sub-level stairways containing four steps down towards the main corridor.
NOT USED: Keep walking forward for about ten (10) steps. Then turn cautiously to the right and take the sub-level stairways containing four steps down towards the main corridor.
Please be careful , confirm the presence of the four step sub-level stairway in front of you when you get there. When ready, please wait for the notification alert and say "Yes I can confirm".

This waypoint is FOUR STEPS: Be careful , use the hand rails and take the four step sub-level stairway down to the main corridor. This corridor is narrow and long, keep walking forward for about twenty five more (25) steps. At the end of this corridor take the sub-level stairways containing two steps up and turn to the right towards room number two six seven (267).
Please confirm the presence of the two step sub-level stairway in front of you when you get there. When ready, please wait for the notification alert and say "Yes I can confirm".

This waypoint is TWO STEPS: Use the hand rails and take the sub-level stairways containing two steps up and turn to the right towards room number two six seven (267). Keep walking forward for about twenty (20) more steps. Room number two six seven (267) is at the end of this corridor, in front of you, passed a narrow open doorway.
This waypoint is END POINT: You have arrived to room number two six seven (267) which has its door in front of you.
Please confirm the presence of the narrow open doorway in front of you when you get there. When ready, please wait for the notification alert and say "Yes I can confirm"..

This waypoint is STARTING POINT: Please start walking forward for about twenty five (25) steps. Then turn cautiously to the left and take the sub-level stairways containing four steps down towards the main corridor.
Your response was yes.
Your response was no.
Please say yes or no only.
Would you like me to repeat?
Please repeat your answer.
